rules.natural: Either insurance is valid for the rafting expedition or a waiver has been signed for the rafting expedition.

If a waiver has been signed for the rafting expedition, then whenever the reservation is confirmed for the rafting expedition, then under the condition that payment has been made for the rafting expedition, the rafting expedition has been launched.

In case coverage is active for the rafting expedition, then if the reservation is confirmed for the rafting expedition, provided that payment has been made for the rafting expedition, the rafting expedition has been launched.
Whenever the premium has been paid for the rafting expedition, then if insurance is valid for the rafting expedition, coverage is active for the rafting expedition.
Either the premium has been paid for the rafting expedition or the policy is active for the rafting expedition.
If permits have been issued for the rafting expedition, then under the condition that a safety briefing has not been conducted for the rafting expedition, the safety kit is missing.
If the weather is good on the day, then permits have been issued for the rafting expedition.
Whenever the water level is safe in the river, permits have been issued for the rafting expedition.
If a guide is available for the rafting expedition, then either the weather is good on the day or the water level is safe in the river.
Either a guide is available for the rafting expedition or the equipment has been checked for the rafting expedition.
Provided that the equipment has been checked for the rafting expedition, then either the weather is good on the day or the water level is safe in the river.
If the rafting expedition has been launched, then the rafting expedition has been completed.

If it is not the case that if the policy is active for the rafting expedition, then provided that insurance is valid for the rafting expedition, coverage is active for the rafting expedition, then an emergency has been declared for the rafting expedition.
If permits have not been issued for the rafting expedition, then payment has been made for the rafting expedition.
Under the condition that permits have not been issued for the rafting expedition, it is not the case that the rafting expedition has been completed.
Whenever a safety briefing has not been conducted for the rafting expedition, it is not the case that the safety kit is missing.
